solution_line_template: Beth had {initial_students} students her 10th-grade year, and added {students_joined} more the following for a total of {initial_students}+{students_joined}= <<{initial_students}+{students_joined}={after_joined}>>{after_joined} students
In her final year, {students_left} students left her class, bringing her total to {after_joined}-{students_left}={final_students} students
